nodes.text: Lynlee was a female who had a brief romantic relationship with the combat medic Archiban Kimble, better known as Doc. Doc ended their relationship on the planet Malastare, though he later regretted not giving her some credits to purchase passage on a shuttle when the Jedi Knight Kira Carsen, whom Doc was traveling with, used a mind trick on him to make the medic think about his ex-girlfriends.
Lynlee has so far only been mentioned once in "Crazy Talk," an optional conversation with the Jedi Knight companion character Doc in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
